Title: Chairman Mao inspects Fushun
Designer: Art Creation Group of the Liaoning Provincial Propaganda Institute (辽宁省宣传馆美术创作组)Wu Yunhua (吴云华)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社) Beijing
Notes: Mao visited the West Open-pit Mine (西露天矿, Xilutiankuang) in Fushun, Liaoning province, once the largest open-pit coal mine in Asia, on 13 February 1958.Artist Wu Yunhua's name is not given on the poster.
